Tap the NFC Tag to your device !
The pensioner is living in a location where it is possible for them to walk easily to access public transport - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0

A toilet exists in, or within easy reach of the pensioner - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0
A functioning water tap is in, or close to the house - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0
The pensioner has an adequate bed - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0

The pensioner can look up and dial numbers on the phone without help - IF YES SCORE 2, IF NO SCORE 0

The pensioner can plan, prepare and serve adequate meals - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0

The pensioner has a kerosene or gas stove and can operate it - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0

The pensioner is supported by a trained non family member delivering good support - IF YES SCORE 5, IF NO SCORE 0

The pensioner has a small income generated from renting out a room, a garden of animals in addition to their welfare pension - IF YES SCORE 1, IF NO SCORE 0
